info.description:
Characters:

Amanda-19 years old. She only somewhat recently graduated and is babysitting to get through college. Crazy? Perhaps, but not as much as this story will be. She's pretty average, maybe a bit tall. Brunette.

Mrs. Riny-35 year old mother of three.

Katie-14 year old sex-crazed girl. I know it's generally best to avoid that type, but Katie takes it to a new level. She's a bit short, has black hair.

Ashley-12 year old girl who is seemingly always with her friends Tate and Liza. Bratty at times, though.

Sophia-9 year old little girl. She's odd in how often she's alone....and she carries a stuffed sheep. She's also small for her age.


Rules are pretty obvious. Everyone is straight, but Katie doesn't seem to care and the others are pretty playful in given situations. I'll be pretty lax.
I'd appreciate others adding to this, but that's kinda obvious. So enjoy the story.
